ResourceHeader.ResourceName: ROSETTA RPC-MIP Calibrated Electric Field Power Spectrum in Passive LDL Window mode (CDF)
ResourceHeader.Description: This dataset contains E-field power spectra acquired in passive LDL mode. The frequency table is fixed, with 32 frequency bins in the [7 kHz - 224 kHz] range and 16 frequency bins in the [238 kHz - 448 kHz] range. The time resolution depends on the operational mode.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator(s), the RPC-MIP Team, the ESA Planetary Science Archive as well as the CDPP (Centre de Données de la Physique des Plasmas) for the provision of these data when making a publication using these data. Principal Investigator(s) : P. Henri (LPC2E/CNRS, Orléans, France)

AccessURL.Name: REGARDS
AccessURL.Description: Access via CNES Data Archive for CDPP

Parameter.Name: Frequency
Parameter.Description: Fixed frequency table: 32 frequency bins in the [7-224] kHz range and 16 frequency bins in the [238-448] kHz range

Parameter.Name: Electric Field Power (Passive LDL mode)
Parameter.Description: Electric Field Power Spectrum (Passive LDL mode)
